name: move-tab-to-next-window
description: Move tab to next window browser context menu extension

scripts.build-ff: npm run clean && npm run build-assets-ff && parcel build src/index.ts --no-source-maps
scripts.build-chrome: npm run clean && npm run build-assets-chrome && parcel build src/index.ts --no-source-maps
scripts.dev-ff: npm run clean && npm run build-assets-ff && parcel src/index.ts --no-hmr
scripts.dev-chrome: npm run clean && npm run build-assets-chrome && parcel src/index.ts --no-hmr
scripts.zip-ff: npm run build-ff && cd dist && bestzip dist-ff.zip * && cd .. && bestzip dist/src-ff.zip src src-assets-ff *.json *.md LICENSE
scripts.zip-chrome: npm run build-chrome && cd dist && bestzip dist-chrome.zip *

author: Roman Shevtsov
